Sneakers didn’t stand a chance in Milan this week. Dressing up has become cool again—think sharp shoes and relaxed tailoring. Take inspiration from Troye Sivan, Saint Levant, Harris Dickinson, Damson Idris, Mads Mikkelsen, Lucien Laviscount, and more of the stylish men on the front row at Prada, Zegna, and Dolce&Gabbana. Discover Level’s Fashion Week edit to stay ahead of the game.
